WorkshopItemInfo.Name: More Tech
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
Adds some more tech to (late) game. New Habs: [list] [*]Early tier-1 research lab providing 15 research [*]More powerful fusion generator that uses exotic matter and antimatter to produce vast amounts of power, which is good as the other modules require a lot of power. [*]More powerful solar farm that uses exotic matter and antimatter to produce vast amounts of power. [*]Exotic matter production: uses antimatter and a lot of power to generate exotic matter <*!* - note see below> [*]More Antimatter production: upgrades of the supercollider, using exotic matter for even more antimatter production [*]Synthesiser: A matter-energy converter that generates basic resources for a hab [*]Metal Irradiator: Turns metals and noble metals into fissible [*]Six advanced Mining-Habs (two per tier) that consume exotics and/or antimatter for increased yield [*]An advanced Nanofactoring complex using exotic matter to produce more money an improve buildtime [/list]
Projects [list] [*]Future-Tech: Welfare providing increased welfare reduction of global warming. [*]Repeatable faction project: Advanced Space Exploitation Studies (5% Space Mining boost) [*]Two projects reducing hab bombing damage [*]Two projects reducing MCU signature for alien hate without Pherocryte Analysis [*]Repeatable project to update the alien threat meter [*]Repeatable project to extend councillors life expectancy [/list]
Ship-Equipment [list] [*]Advanced plasma cannons (MKIV + MKV) [*]Advanced Hybrid Armor [/list]
(*)The exotics production means you will end up outproducing the aliens in this. To counteract this you can use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3165648550] More Exotics for Aliens [/url] to boost their production as well.
For a change in balance regarding the vanilla buildings you can check out [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2888192881] Scale Up[/url]
